item.medieval.challenge_orb.found: Found structure: %s. Click again to regenerate.
item.medieval.challenge_orb.tooltip: Regenerates a nearby boss structure, even if you've already regenerated it. Consumed on use.
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.cooldow: Town Portal is still on cooldown for %s
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.telepor: No respawn location found. Teleporting to world spawn.
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.tooltip: Channel to teleport to your bed, or to the world spawn if you have no bed. Cooldown: 10 minutes
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.wrong_d: This item can only be used in the Overworld
item.medieval.wayfinders_medallion.activ: Medallion activated, but automatic regeneration is disabled in config
item.medieval.wayfinders_medallion.auto_: Warning: Automatic regeneration is disabled in config
item.medieval.wayfinders_medallion.toolt: While enabled, automatically regenerate most dungeons the first time you visit them.
Only works if held, or equipped in the charm slot.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.addition: Individual structure IDs (in the format 'modid:structure_name') that should also be able to be regenerated with Challenge Orbs.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.allowedS: Mod IDs of structures which should all be able to be regenerated with Challenge Orbs.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.autoRege: How often to check if a player is in a regenerable structure (in ticks).
Maximum distance from player to detect structures for auto-regeneration (in blocks).
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.cancelLe: Whether fully passive mobs (cows, chickens, etc.) should always be level 1.
Only works if Autoleveling and Passive Skill Tree are both installed.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.enableAu: Whether structures should automatically regenerate when players enter them for the first time.
Respects activity checks and claimed chunk protection.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.leveling: The radius to search for players with skill tree points when adding to mob levels, in blocks.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.levelsPe: The number of additional levels to add to mobs per average point in the skill tree of nearby players.
text.autoconfig.medieval.option.structur: How long a structure must be inactive before it can be regenerated (in seconds).
Search radius for nearby structures when using the Challenge Orb, in Chunks.
Configure which structures can be regenerated by Challenge Orbs, Exploration Orbs, and Auto-regeneration.
Use allowedNamespaces for mod IDs and additionalStructures for specific structure resource locations.
Specific structure IDs (format: 'modid:structure_name') that should be regenerable.
Mod IDs whose structures should all be regenerable.
Structure IDs that should never be regenerated, even if their namespace is allowed.
